channel.title: Yes, Bitcoin consumes a lot of energy on whyproofof.work
channel.description: Recent content in Yes, Bitcoin consumes a lot of energy on whyproofof.work

item.title: Contribute through GitHub
item.description: Since I still do not possess all the knowledge about Bitcoin and Proof-of-Work myself, I made this website open-source. Everyone can contribute through GitHub by forking and submitting pull requests.
